data.message: So many dumb people thinking that Eminem will even try to read a  comment here hahaha...

replies.message: Well... if not only, then most of the comments here are :"Eminem i love you" ;"Eminem if you don't drop your album in the next 5 seconds i'll kill myself" ; "Eminem i'd like you to be my father" ; "Eminem i'd die for you " ; " Eminem i"d kill my whole family starting with my kids and finishing with my grand grandparents if they're still alive"  ;" EmiGod / Emking / Em The Greatest i love u / i want u/ i need u/ i see u there and here and in my dreams even in my toilet"  and the list goes on.  FUCKING BRAINWASHED people. I like Eminem too, but i wouldn t do anything i mentioned above. Don't be a fucking slave...
